quotes.text: Peace is not the absence of conflict, but the ability to cope with it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.text: Breathe in peace, breathe out tension.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Relax. You’re not required to set yourself on fire to keep others warm.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sometimes the most productive thing you can do is relax.
quotes.author: Mark Black

tasks: Take a few moments to close your eyes and breathe deeply.
Spend 5 minutes sitting in silence, enjoying the calm around you.
Write down three things you’re grateful for today.
Stretch your body for a few minutes to enhance relaxation.
Find a quiet place and just listen to the calming nature sounds for 10 minutes.

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

tasks: Set a small, achievable goal for today and take the first step toward it.
Try brainstorming a new idea for a project, something that excites you.
Take 10 minutes to write down a list of things you love doing or want to explore.
Create a vision board (physical or digital) of your dreams and goals.
Reflect on one of your past successes, and plan how you can replicate that feeling.

quotes.text: Stress is caused by being 'here' but wanting to be 'there.'
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: You can’t calm the storm… so stop trying. What you can do is calm yourself. The storm will pass.
quotes.author: Timber Hawkeye

quotes.text: Take a deep breath, and remember: you’ve made it through every tough day so far.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Self-care is not selfish. You cannot serve from an empty vessel.
quotes.author: Eleanor Brown

quotes.text: The time to relax is when you don’t have time for it.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

tasks: Take 5 minutes for deep breathing exercises, focusing on your breath.
Write down what’s stressing you out, and then jot down possible solutions or actions.
Step away from work or stress triggers for a brief walk outside.
Call or text a friend to share what’s on your mind.
Do a quick 5-minute body scan and release any tension you notice.
